__e: But, we're not all glad to see you as much as before.
If you say your parents aren't here, then we'll just believe that your parents weren't here.
Can you believe that my friend told me that she died so that she didn't have to hang out with me?
I wanna believe you, but I've been with enough women... ... toknowthatitdoesn'thappen that fast.
Frank, I want to believe you, but what kind of future can we have with him with us all the time?
I didn't believe you, but you were right, so naturally, I figured you're an expert, and you know just what you're doing all the time.
